timeline.title: Computer Science B.Sc.
timeline.description: B.Sc. in computer science graduate from Tel-Hai College, specialized in software development.

timeline.title: OS and Assembly Language Instructor
timeline.description:
Instructor of the architecture course in the "Magshimim" program. 
Relaying complex ideas on Windows and Linux OS principles, as well as the Assembly x8086 language while managing a small class of top high school students

timeline.title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer
timeline.description:
• Analyzing and debugging to validate system behaviors
• Testing compatibility with medical devices
• Traveling abroad for Fluoroscopy machines validation
• Developing automation for SQA department efficiency

timeline.title: Software Automation Testing Engineer
timeline.description:
• Created modular automatic testing infrastructure using C#, BASH and Ranorex
• Managed automated daily sanity tests for development builds
• Developed and maintained test plans for the TruDi project
• Led automation efforts to improve test coverage and efficiency
